Reviews.Title: Takes nice Pics
Reviews.Author: tonia
Reviews.Content: Takes good pics and is fairly easy to work but with in 4-5 months of purchasing we have had to send it back for a malfunction in the lens. Havent heard back from Nikon yet as to what the problem is..

Reviews.Title: Charger problems
Reviews.Author: Ricardo
Reviews.Content: I may be having a problem with the battery charger.  It does not show when the battery is fully charged, or charged at all.  The little light come on when plugged in, but then it immediately goes out and I can not tell if the battery is charged.....

Reviews.Title: Just like the pic
Reviews.Author: Timothy Goin
Reviews.Content: Got everything just as the pic showed.  My daughter has used it several times now and likes the pics she is getting.
